Package orange.task

Class Task

java.lang.Object
orange.task.Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
Deadline, Events, Todo
public class Task extends Object
Represents a generic task with a description and completion status. This serves as a base class for specific task types such as Deadlines, Events And Todo.
See Also:

  • Events

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(String description, boolean isDone)
      Constructs a Task with a specified description and completion status.
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the task.
      isDone - The completion status of the task.

    • Task

      public Task(String description)
      Constructs a Task with a specified description. The task is initially not completed.
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the task.

  • Method Details

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Retrieves the description of the task.
      Returns:
      The task description.

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription(String description)
      Updates the description of the task.
      Parameters:
      description - The new task description.

    • getIsDone

      public boolean getIsDone()
      Retrieves the completion status of the task.
      Returns:
      True if the task is completed, false otherwise.

    • setIsDone

      public void setIsDone(boolean isDone)
      Updates the completion status of the task.
      Parameters:
      isDone - The new completion status of the task.

    • printTaskWithCompletion

      public void printTaskWithCompletion()
      Prints the task with its completion status.

      The format is [X] for completed tasks and [ ] for incomplete tasks, followed by the task description.

    • GetTaskWithCompletion

      public String GetTaskWithCompletion()
      Returns a string representation of the task, including its completion status.

      The format is [X] for completed tasks and [ ] for incomplete tasks, followed by the task description.

      Returns:
      A string representing the task with its completion status.
